commons.com.tbitsGlobal.utils.server.rules
Class ClassWriter

java.lang.Object
  commons.com.tbitsGlobal.utils.server.rules.ClassWriter

public class ClassWriter
extends java.lang.Object

This class writes the rules into java classes and compiles class files from the java files. The java file and the class file are available as File objects. The compilation results are stored as a string.

Author:
Karan Gupta
